group_1.textLeft: Yachiyo! Let's make Chuo Ward part of the@west!

group_1.textCenter: The east-side girls are getting cocky because@they think we're pushovers.
We need to teach them a lesson!

group_1.textRight: We can't hand over Chuo Ward to people who@go nuts and do whatever they want.
I'd feel too bad for the Chuo Ward girls.
Even now, some of them are suffering at their@hands.

group_1.textLeft: Some girls are even being forced out of@their own territory!
It's true that we shouldn't allow anyone's@territory to be invaded like that.

group_1.textRight: In that case!

group_1.textLeft: But, how do you know all of this?

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: Is it because you've been visiting Chuo Ward@yourselves?

group_1.textRight: Well, umm...
I have a friend there...
At first, our plan was to get friendly with@someone and get her to share her Witches.
But it's not like that anymore.
She's weak and inexperienced, so we have to@protect her...
Anyway, we aren't using her like what those@girls from the east are doing!
Sometimes we fight together over here, too.@She's our friend now!

group_1.textLeft: The strategy of befriending a Magical Girl@from Chuo Ward...
Strictly speaking, that's also a violation@of the agreement between the east and west.

group_1.textRight: That's...
It was all my idea. So if anyone should be@punished...

group_1.textLeft: If you promise us that you'll stop making a@fuss...
We can let this slide.

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: But your actions have consequences.
I want you to reflect on what you've done.

group_1.textRight: Yes... I'm sorry.
Good thing you were able to calm things down@yesterday.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, but I understand how those girls feel.
It's normal to want to save your friends@when they're in trouble.

group_1.textRight: The negotiations with Kanagi were a complete@failure.
So do you wanna try making Chuo Ward part of@the west?
If they're being pushed around by the east,@they might be happy to join us.

group_1.textLeft: Honestly, I don't know about that.

group_1.textRight: Huh? Why not?

group_1.textLeft: The west-side girls may be doing the same@sort of things.
We don't know for certain that they aren't.
I hate to say it, but I'm sure some of them@are.
People only worry about themselves when@they're cornered.

group_1.textRight: No way...

group_1.textLeft: We have a bigger problem anyway.
We still don't fully understand what's@going on in Chuo Ward.
We don't have control of our own people.@We're in no position to blame the east.
I doubt Kanagi knows everything that's going@on either.
But either way, as leaders, it's our duty@to resolve this situation.
Let's start by gathering information.
It should help us come up with solutions.

group_1.textRight: Sounds good! Let me know what I can do to@help.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you.
We'll investigate Chuo Ward to get more@information about the attacks.
I want to see everything with my own eyes.

group_1.textRight: Yes, using only secondhand accounts has its@limits.
Yachan and I willâ€”

group_1.textLeft: I wanna go, too!
I feel so bad that I haven't been able to@help!

group_1.textRight: [chara:100602:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Gah! Wh-where did you come from?
I'm here, too!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, you made it.

group_1.textRight: The Mightiest Magical Girl Tsuruno Yui can@solve any of your problems!
I should probably go too, since you're looking@for the Labyrinth I was attacked in.

group_1.textLeft: All right...
We may even end up fighting a Witch, so@let's all go together.
